data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pierce, Mac P., Leong, Chi-Man, Guenard, Benoit (2019): A new species and new record of the cryptobiotic ant genus Ponera Latreille, 1804 (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) from Hong Kong. ZooKeys 867: 9-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.867.36139, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.867.36139
